data.constituency-description: The Constituency consists of the entire A2A Group. A2A-CERT provides the Group's companies - including subsidiaries and their assets - with the whole Cyber Defence service portfolio, as established within the service contracts. Furthermore, A2A-CERT focuses on protecting and safeguarding the Constituency's business infrastructures and services - as well as the confidentiality, integrity and availability of its information assets - from potential threats within the cyberspace, by preventing, containing and neutralizing malicious events both within the Information Technology (IT) and Operational Technology (OT) environments.
